meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking value or worth.
meanings.sent1: The valuelessnesses of the old, broken toy made it easy to throw away.
meanings.sent2: The teacher emphasized the valuelessnesses of cheating in school.
meanings.sent3: The valuelessnesses of the empty candy wrapper made it a perfect candidate for recycling.
meanings.sent4: The valuelessnesses of the fake jewelry became apparent when it started tarnishing.
meanings.sent5: The valuelessnesses of the old newspapers piled up in the corner of the room.

meanings.definition: The condition of being without importance or significance.
meanings.sent1: The valuelessnesses of the small talk at the party bored me.
meanings.sent2: The valuelessnesses of the argument became clear as they continued to yell.
meanings.sent3: The valuelessnesses of the broken pencil amused the students as they tried to use it.
meanings.sent4: The valuelessnesses of the empty promises left her feeling disappointed.
meanings.sent5: The valuelessnesses of the old, dusty book on the shelf were evident.
